From the brand

2022 Christmas is Coming!

Countdown to Xmas with Meland christmas inflatable outdoor decorations – the cute penguins, Santa Claus, Large Christmas Archway.

Christmas Inflatable Outdoors

Christmas blow ups

· 【All The Christmas outdoor decorations Characters In One Package】This Xmas inflatable decorations including the Santa Claus, Socks, tree. the cute reindeer and gift box. Such an attractive blow up Christmas decorations outdoor yard make your friends and guest impressive in the holiday party night.
· 【Self Inflates In Seconds & Light Up the Holiday Night.】Meland Christmas blow ups equipped with a strong built-in fan and internal bright lighting. When plus it into a standard electrical outlet, the Santa, the reindeer and the socks, all the Xmas display will illuminate your garden, lawn and yard at night then create a great nighttime effect and attract lots of attentions.
· 【Durable material and compact outdoor christmas decorations design.】 Our Christmas blow up yard decorations featured with lightweight and weather resistant polyester as well as compact design make it easy to set up, take down and storage, allowing your family use this Xmas inflatable christmas decorations for next year.
· 【Includes Necessary Accessories for Stability.】 Our lighted Santa inflatables outdoor decorations built-in with 3 sandbags, 6 ground stakes, 2 tether ropes for making the large countdown inflatables more stable for outdoor and indoor set up. A joyful Santa blow up yard decorations display improve the festival atmosphere and leave you a beautiful outdoor christmas inflatables memory.
· 【Adorable Outside Christmas Yard Inflatables with Decent Quality. 】Meland christmas outdoor inflatables has an IP44 waterproof rating, both UL and CE certification. A must choice for your 2022 christmas blowups decoration.

Warm Tips Avoiding plug walkway stake lights in hard groud To prevent damaging to bottom accessories of stakes. IP44 waterproof C9 multicolor driveway markers Christmas lights Please avoiding to outdoor use in windy or stormy weather.

C9 LED ENERGY SAVING

Energy efficient LED bulbs reduce power needs by up to 90%. Excellent heat dissipation and flicker free lighting than incandescent string lights; long lifespan up to 50,000 hours.

SAFETY UL LISTED GUARANTY

IP44 waterproof level & UL Listed for outdoor & indoor use; Bulbs are virtually unbreakable, and colors never fade, chip or crack. The colorful Christams lights and a strong Christmas atmosphere will be the envy to your neighbor.

CHRISTMAS PATHWAY MARKER LIGHTS

C9 Traditional Christmas lights outdoor decorations lawn lights pathway lights imbue happiness and an exciting Christmas for your friends and families.!Keep Christmas spirit going well by illuminating your life.

【Safety Convenient & Practical】： 6″ lead with male plug, 12″ spacing between LED multicolor bulbs, 6″ tail with female connector.The male plug contains a spare fuse. 0.6Watt/Bulbs (totals 8bulbs).Each set LED multicolor Christmas pathway stake lights outdoor 2.4 watts, can connect up to 180 sets holiday pathway string lights(Max 432 watts) plug in and enjoy it.
【IP44 Water-Resistant】：Christmas Walkway outdoor decorations string lights , commercial-strength casing withstands extreme temperatures and wet weather. Keep the string lights plug as dry as possible.If a light bulb that goes out does not affect other lighting bulb.
【Multi-Function Atmosphere】：C9 Christmas lawn decorations pathway markers stakes lights easy to installation.shatterproof and IP44 waterproof, Fits great for patio, backyard, deck, bistro, café, pergola, garden, market, wedding party, Christmas decoration and many other occasions or events.
【EASY TO INTALL】：C9 Christmas lawn decorations pathway markers stakes lights easy to installation, Christmas pathway lights plug in and use it, Empty sockets be firstly and then install bulbs. Set up your string lights in minutes. Each 7foot strand offers end-to-end connections.
